<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fiendish Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=7526) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 277

**Prerequisites**

</column>

---

Your features reshape into those of a type of [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=600) who serves your [deity](/Rules.aspx?ID=2048); for example, as a [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=387) you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes. You gain a [fly Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2350) equal to your Speed. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2410) if you don’t already have it, and you gain the fiend trait and the trait appropriate to the type of servitor you’ve become (such as [daemon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=386), demon, or [devil](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=389)).
name: Fiendish Form
